title: "Windows doesn't recognize device" when attempting cable download...?!?
content:
Pixel 3XL directly connected to computer; with Windows 10 OS, using a cable for downloads. I've attempted to change "USB setting" from "charging" to transfer files or USB storage device and always receive a message that - windows does Not recognize USB device and I cannot transfer anything....!

Frustrating, especially when it used to be sssooooooo easy to switch between the two settings and just download.

Thank you kindly for remedying this silly "glitch".
